titles.title: Medicare Access Improvement Act of 2014
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a minimum Medicare payment rate for primary care services furnished by primary care physicians.
Medicare Access Improvement Act of 2014

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Medicare Access Improvement Act of 2014 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to establish a minimum payment rate for primary care services furnished in 2015 and 2016 by a primary care physician (in family medicine, general internal medicine, or geriatric medicine).
